remarks: If something is true for all then it's true for some class. (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 9-Mar-2020.)
statement:
rspcdvinvd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
rspcdvinvd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
rspcdvinvd.3 $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. B ps ) $.
rspcdvinvd $p |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
